title: Alex Matthews to captain England in final World Cup pool game against Australia
summary: Alex Matthews will lead England as captain from the No8 position in their final World Cup pool match against Australia. Jess Breach will also mark a milestone by earning her 50th cap during the game. This match is significant for both players as they aim for victory in a crucial matchup.

title: Is Britain really the new North Korea? Let us consider the evidence | Martin Kettle
summary: Guardian columnist Martin Kettle argues that while the Labour party faced significant issues this week, exaggerated media claims distort political discourse. He emphasizes the importance of a nuanced discussion rather than sensationalism in reporting. Kettle suggests that such overblown narratives ultimately harm the depth of political debate.
